      public Book(String title, String authorFirstName, String authorLastName, String genre, double price, int quantity)
      Constructor for creating a book object with specified parameters
      Parameters:
      title - - String value of the title
      authorFirstName - - String value of the author's first name
      authorLastName - - String value of the authror's last name
      genre - - String value of the book's genre
      price - - double value of the book's price
      quantity - - integer value of the book's on hand quantity
